title: Cry Baby [1990 PAL DVD][En Multisubs[10]
description:
Description
It's the 1950s gang scene where face is everything and mixing with the uncool is frowned upon. When Allison from the Squares falls for Cry-Baby Walker of the Drapes all social barriers fall away as they fight the system to be together.
